description: Enterprise techniques used by RawDisk, ATT&CK software S0364 v1.0
name: RawDisk (S0364)

techniques.comment: RawDisk was used in Shamoon to write to protected system locations such as the MBR and disk partitions in an effort to destroy data.
RawDisk has been used to directly access the hard disk to help overwrite arbitrarily sized portions of disk content.
RawDisk was used in Shamoon to help overwrite components of disk structure like the MBR and disk partitions.
